{"id":712904201,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"9Â months","timestamp":1654186427,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/712904201/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Digits","memory":"41.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int addDigits(int num) {\n        if(num >= 0 && num <= 9){\n            return num;\n        }\n        String s = Integer.toString(num);\n        return add(s);\n        \n    }\n    private int add(String num){\n        if(num.length() == 1){\n           return Integer.parseInt(num);\n        }\n        else{\n            int s = 0;\n            for(int i = 0;i<num.length();i++){\n               s += num.charAt(i)-'0';\n            }\n            return add(Integer.toString(s));\n        }\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-digits","has_notes":false}
